subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Manchester United, Arsenal and Bayern Munich took big strides toward the next round of the Champions League with easy victories, and Juventus beat Real Madrid, 2-1, on a night of high scoring across Europe. Dimitar Berbatov had two goals and Wayne Rooney scored for the ninth time in seven games as Manchester United outplayed the Scottish champion Celtic, 3-0. Arsenal won at Fenerbahce, 5-2, and Bayern shrugged off its poor play in the Bundesliga with a 3-0 victory over Fiorentina.
